Title: Touching Ground
Description:
Their town is burning and their men are scattered and broken. I need every available man on the ground NOW to finish them off.

Grab one of the parachutes on the edge of the ship and get down there!
ObjectivesText: Use a Skyfire Parachute to touch ground in Garrosh'ar Point, then speak to Sully "The Pickle" McLeary.
RewardText: 'Bout time you showed up, $Gladdy:lassie;! Let's do some damage!
